primary_changes: Added detailed error and information logging
Replaced string formatting with context-aware logging

patterns_discovered: Consistent logging across different stages of processing
gotchas_discovered: Original logging was using f-strings with minimal context
Potential information loss in previous logging approach
Lack of detailed tracking for multi-step processes
recommendations: Standardize logging across all modules with similar structured approach
Include step identifiers in all logging calls
Add additional contextual information like timestamps, process IDs
Consider using a logging configuration that supports structured logging
